summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1456, for the improvement of Boylston Avenue North in the City of Seattle from Denny Way to John Street, by grading and paving the same, and by constructing necessary sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 15625 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
